name: Protogun - LD28
description:
Protogun is a submission for the 28th Ludum Dare game programming competition. Competitors had to make a game in under 48 hours based on the theme "You only get one". Protogun was lucky enough to place 3rd out of over 1200 participants!

The game features pixel graphics and 10 levels. The levels can be easily replayed to try and get faster times and higher scores. Post your scores and compete with others!

You can move Proto up, down, left, and right with WASD and use the mouse to fire the laser. Take out the red-coats without harming the civilians. Good luck and enjoy!
